page.title: 16PAGHAM PARISH COUNCIL
page.content:
We wrote to the Clerk and Executive Officer of Pagham Parish Council. He told us that just recently the Government has carried out a{boundary {review}which has meant that a part of the parish has been transferred to Aldwick Parish Council. This is the second time that this has happened.
The Parish Council{owns and maintains} bus shelters, public seats, lighting, litter bins, notice boards, a car park, a play area at Hook Lane/Sefter Road and play equipment for part of the foreshore with seats and walkway.
The council has two{employees;}the clerk, who is part time, and a casual labourer employed to clean the bus shelters and, during the summer, the foreshore and play area.
